message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products, and I'm confident you'll love it. It's a great opportunity to get a unique item at a fantastic price. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I'm not sure if I'm ready to make a decision without knowing the quality of the product. Can you please reveal its quality first?
